question.title: Print a big table on a PDF using ITextPdf7
question.body:
I have an issue using ITextPdf-7.2.6. I would like to print a big table on a PDF but I always have those two issues. I have an infinite loop if I recreate the renderer or a NullPointerException if I try to continue with the previous renderer. How should I procced to achieve it ?

public class App 
{
  public static void main(String[] args) {
    try {
        PdfWriter writer = new PdfWriter("test.pdf");
        PdfDocument pdf = new PdfDocument(writer);
        pdf.addNewPage();
        Document document = new Document(pdf);
        Table table = new Table(UnitValue.createPercentArray(new float[]{1, 1}));
        table.setWidth(UnitValue.createPercentValue(100));
        PdfFont font = PdfFontFactory.createFont(StandardFonts.HELVETICA, PdfEncodings.WINANSI, EmbeddingStrategy.FORCE_NOT_EMBEDDED);
        for(int i=0; i<10; i=i+2) {
          table.addCell(new Cell().add(new Paragraph("Lorem Ipsum").setFont(font)));
          table.addCell(new Cell().add(new Paragraph("Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.").setFont(font)));
        }
        integrateTableToPDF2(table, new Rectangle(PageSize.A4), pdf);
        document.close();
        System.out.println("OK");
    } catch(Exception e) {
      e.printStackTrace();
    }
  }
  
  private static void integrateTableToPDF(Table table, Rectangle pagesize, PdfDocument doc) throws IOException {
        float marginLeft = 60;
        float marginRight = 20;
        float marginBottom = 50;
        float usableWidth = pagesize.getWidth() - marginLeft - marginRight;
        float usableHeight = pagesize.getHeight() - marginBottom;
        Rectangle drawArea = new Rectangle(marginLeft, marginBottom, usableWidth, usableHeight);
        PdfPage page = doc.getLastPage();
        PdfCanvas pdfCanvas = new PdfCanvas(page);
        Canvas canvas = new Canvas(pdfCanvas, drawArea);
        TableRenderer renderer = (TableRenderer) table.createRendererSubTree();
        renderer.setParent(canvas.getRenderer());
        LayoutResult result = renderer.layout(new LayoutContext(new LayoutArea(doc.getNumberOfPages()-1, drawArea)));
        renderer.draw(new DrawContext(doc, pdfCanvas));
        while (result.getStatus() != LayoutResult.FULL) {
            TableRenderer overflowRenderer = (TableRenderer) result.getOverflowRenderer();
            PdfPage newPage = doc.addNewPage();
            PdfCanvas newCanvas = new PdfCanvas(newPage);
            Rectangle nextDrawArea = new Rectangle(marginLeft, marginBottom, usableWidth, pagesize.getHeight() - marginBottom);
            LayoutArea newArea = new LayoutArea(doc.getNumberOfPages()-1, nextDrawArea);
            Canvas nextCanvasModel = new Canvas(newCanvas, nextDrawArea);
            overflowRenderer.setParent(nextCanvasModel.getRenderer());
            result = overflowRenderer.layout(new LayoutContext(newArea));
            overflowRenderer.draw(new DrawContext(doc, newCanvas));
            nextCanvasModel.flush();
            nextCanvasModel.close();
        }
        canvas.flush();
        canvas.close();
    }
  
  private static void integrateTableToPDF2(Table table, Rectangle pagesize, PdfDocument doc) throws IOException {
        float marginLeft = 60;
        float marginRight = 20;
        float marginBottom = 50;
        float usableWidth = pagesize.getWidth() - marginLeft - marginRight;
        float usableHeight = pagesize.getHeight() - marginBottom;
        Rectangle drawArea = new Rectangle(marginLeft, marginBottom, usableWidth, usableHeight);
        PdfPage page = doc.getLastPage();
        PdfCanvas pdfCanvas = new PdfCanvas(page);
        Canvas canvas = new Canvas(pdfCanvas, drawArea);
        TableRenderer renderer = (TableRenderer) table.createRendererSubTree();
        renderer.setParent(canvas.getRenderer());
        LayoutResult result = renderer.layout(new LayoutContext(new LayoutArea(doc.getNumberOfPages()-1, drawArea)));
        renderer.draw(new DrawContext(doc, pdfCanvas));
        while (result.getStatus() != LayoutResult.FULL) {
            PdfPage newPage = doc.addNewPage();
            PdfCanvas newCanvas = new PdfCanvas(newPage);
            Rectangle nextDrawArea = new Rectangle(marginLeft, marginBottom, usableWidth, pagesize.getHeight() - marginBottom);
            LayoutArea newArea = new LayoutArea(doc.getNumberOfPages()-1, nextDrawArea);
            Canvas nextCanvasModel = new Canvas(newCanvas, nextDrawArea);
            renderer = (TableRenderer) table.createRendererSubTree();           
            renderer.setParent(nextCanvasModel.getRenderer());
            result = renderer.layout(new LayoutContext(newArea));
            renderer.draw(new DrawContext(doc, newCanvas));
            nextCanvasModel.flush();
            nextCanvasModel.close();
            if(doc.getNumberOfPages()==20)
              throw new IOException("Infinite loop !");
        }
        canvas.flush();
        canvas.close();
    }
}

Please update the main changing integrateTableToPDF to integrateTableToPDF2 to test the two options.

Output using integrateTableToPDF :

java.lang.NullPointerException
    at com.itextpdf.layout.renderer.AbstractRenderer.isFirstOnRootArea(AbstractRenderer.java:2380)
    at com.itextpdf.layout.renderer.TableRenderer.layout(TableRenderer.java:294)
    at com.itextpdftest.App.integrateTableToPDF(App.java:71)
    at com.itextpdftest.App.main(App.java:41)

    at com.itextpdftest.App.integrateTableToPDF2(App.java:107)
    at com.itextpdftest.App.main(App.java:41)
